amendment.description: Amendment provides for expedited consideration by Congress of a balanced budget bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend certain authorities of the Foreign Relations Authorization Act from December 31, 1995 to March 31, 1996 and to provide for expedited procedures for consideration of a balanced budget bill in the House and in the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
